reviews.review_msg: Besides his French accent which was hard to understand, he was useless with facts and seemed very flustered when he taught.  I have not had him for any other Pol class, but hopefully he is better at teaching facts than Stats. I do not recommend taking a class with him if it is a required component for you degree.

He was a fantastic prof. Very knowledgable about the subject. He made class interesting and the material incredibly clear. Pay attention to the lecture notes and you'll do fine on tests. Hoping he teaches upper level POL courses as well!

Doesn't express himself clearly. Ever. He always says that he said something but he never said it. Didn't give us a syllabus at the beginning of the year. Never tells you what he wants. It's the end of semester and I still don't know what our class was about
